# Phasing report for best SNPs 2025.09.25
## Phasing error rates per chromosome and number of parents in same batch as child

| Parents in batch | min | max | median | mean |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 0 | 0 | 1 | 0.5 | 0.49 |
| 1 | 0 | 0.006 | 0 | 2.8e-05 |
| 2 | 0 | 0.0029 | 0 | 6.5e-07 |
